mapper.insert:
select sysdate from dual
insert into orders (ORDER_ID, RECEIVER_NAME, RECEIVER_ADDRESS_ROAD, RECEIVER_ADDRESS_JIBUN, RECEIVER_TEL, PAYMENT, ORDER_DATE, TOTAL_PRICE, USER_ID) values (#{order.orderId},#{order.receiverName}, #{order.receiverAddrRoad}, #{order.receiverAddrJibun}, #{order.receiverTel}, #{order.payment}, sysdate, #{order.totalPrice}, #{userId})

insert into order_list (OPTION_ID, PRODUCT_ID, ORDER_ID, ORDER_LIST_QTY, ORDERED_PRICE, USER_ID) values (#{orderList.oid}, #{orderList.pid}, #{orderId}, #{orderList.qty}, #{orderList.marketPrice}, #{userId})
mapper.select: select o.orderId orderId, o.orderDate orderDate, p.product_id prodId, p.product_name prodName, p.product_thumb thumb, po.option_id oid, po.option_name optionName, ol.ordered_price marketPrice, ol.order_list_qty qty, b.brand_id bId, b.brand_name brandName from ( select * from ( select rownum rn, o.order_id orderId, o.order_date orderDate from orders o where o.user_id = #{userId} and o.order_date between add_months(sysdate,#{cri.type}) and sysdate order by order_date desc) where rownum<= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} ) o inner join order_list ol on (o.orderId = ol.order_id) inner join options po on (po.option_id = ol.option_id) inner join product p on (po.product_id = p.product_id) inner join brand b on (p.brand_id = b.brand_id) where rn > (#{cri.pageNum} - 1) * #{cri.amount}
